review: I don't have a vagina, per se, but you'd think I did... because the only thing I have been able to watch with Chromecast is One Tree Hill. I bought it to watch the EPL games that weren't televised, but my daughter totally hi-jacked it. So, it works as advertised.... I think. I wouldn't know, but I totally hate Peyton, and Lindsay with her man-face and big butt.
